name: Roll Or Die (WeirdRoiund)
description:
• Objective
    Kill all the enemies in the room, without dying you have perks that will help you to kill the enemies or even save from death.
  • Controls
    ← :  Move Right
    → :  Move Left
    ↑    :  Move Up
    ↓    :  Move Down
    Ctrl  : Change Dice  
  • Perks 
          Area Damage (Makes damage to surounding enemies and barrels)
          Double Turn (Can make another turn before enemies)
          Invincible (You evade dmg one turn)
          One Hit (Kills in one hit)
          Luck (Gives more loot)
  • Dices
          Normal: Its a normal dice with aleatory results
          One: The result is always one
          Two: The result is always two
          Three: The result is always three
          Four: The result is always four
          Five: The result is always five
          Six : The result is always six
